artist: Artist: Josh MacPhee; Author: Maia Ramnath; Printer: P&L Printing, Denver; Publisher: Institute for Anarchist Studies

description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress text and a photomechanical illustration of a pattern of tea bags and handguns printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 15 pp.

title: Colonialism
